tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: Venezuela is home to stunning natural attractions, including Angel Falls, the world's highest waterfall, and the diverse landscapes of the Amazon rainforest and the Andes Mountains.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country boasts a diverse cultural heritage influenced by Indigenous, African, and European traditions, seen in its music, dance, art, and cuisine.

tidbits.title: Oil Reserves
tidbits.description: Venezuela holds some of the world's largest oil reserves, playing a significant role in its economy, although facing challenges related to its oil industry.
